name: Dark Shiny Blue, transparency fixes
description:
just some fixes for Dark Shiny Blue, transparency until he intigrates them into his own style.
gets rid of that wierd bar at the top, and fills in some blank white spaces.
namely fixes the compose areas and makes labels actually readable, as well as killing the random ad gmail generates from your emails.

newest fixes: dropdown bar for labels and more actions, background made more reliable

go here for the actual style:
http://userstyles.org/styles/4374
